subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Weather
lead_paragraph: Once ranked No. 1 in the world, Lleyton Hewitt has struggled but he remains a fighter as he proved by defeating the tenacious American Michael Russell, 3-6, 2-6, 6-3, 6-3, 6-3, in the first round.
snippet: Once ranked No. 1 in the world, Lleyton Hewitt has struggled but he remains a fighter as he proved by defeating the tenacious American Michael Russell, 3-6, 2-6, 6-3, 6-3, 6-3, in the first round.
